name: sls-ssr
description: A function using express middleware and chrome renderton to serve ssr content
author: borzou@theboeffect.com

scripts.package: RUN_LOCAL=false yarn && babel src -d dist && rm -rf ./node_modules/ && yarn --production && node-prune && sls package
scripts.deploy: RUN_LOCAL=false yarn && babel src -d dist && rm -rf ./node_modules/ && yarn --production && node-prune && sls deploy
